description: One of the Netherlands' most notorious crimes is resolved following DNA evidence and a change in law.
title: Nicky Verstappen cold case killing ends in jail after 22 years
title_page: Nicky Verstappen cold case killing ends in jail after 22 years - BBC News
maintext: Brech, a survivalist, was reported missing in April 2018 but a tip-off revealed he had travelled to northern Spain and had been living in a tent in the woods. A Dutchman had seen him in the village of Castelltercol, north of Barcelona, and had spoken to him in July.
